overview: Jose Ali Vivas has a Ph.D. in Theoretical Physics of USB, Venezuela. His research topics are in Complex Adaptive Systems, Swarm Intelligence, multi-agent technologies and non-linear systems. In 2002-03 was member of Program’s Committee Scientific Millenium Iniciative of World Bank in Venezuela. CEO of Terabrain Communications. At ubuket Labs, JosÃ© AlÃ­ is focused on a variety of research interests including visual conversations in Rich Internet Applications, synchronicity and Peer-2-Peer applications. Jose is passionate about: swam intelligence, Internet entrepreneurs with huge network effects, and life with his family
